text: after you go in an RV there's a whole
lot more to think about than just the
comfort of your foot there's a lot of
myths floating around about what kind of
toilet paper you can use in an RV is it
1 ply 3 ply septic RV save I say why
wait so you have a backed-up tank to
figure it out
my friends at sandy dumps calm showed us
this cool test and we just couldn't keep
it to ourselves
find some containers with lids for one
cup of room temperature water into each
container
pull off one square of toilet paper and
set it in each container of water make
sure the toilet paper is completely
saturated
place the lids on and snap them down
give each container a good shake but
only one good shake this single shake
will simulate the toilet flushing
check the containers every couple hours
with a good toilet paper you'll see it
breaking down almost instantly after 24
hours it's obvious the Scot RV toilet
paper broke down the fastest and the
best in contrast this other RV toilet
paper hardly broke down at all in these
wet wipes
I wouldn't put these in any toilet so
don't trust the packaging and don't just
take my word for it grab your favorite
toilet paper and do your own test that
way your butt and your RV are happy
